thread.title: I Wish I'd Been With Beyoncé at Solange's Grammys After-Party
thread.title_full: I Wish I'd Been With Beyoncé at Solange's Grammys After-Party

title: I Wish I'd Been With Beyoncé at Solange's Grammys After-Party
text: I Wish I'd Been With Beyoncé at Solange's Grammys After-Party Most Popular By Alyssa Bailey Feb 16, 2017 After the Grammys, Beyoncé did one better than going to one of the official after-parties or, you know, just going to bed like the rest of us: She changed into a white goddess gown (another look by Peter Dundas) and headed to Solange's private shindig. She revealed this today on her site when she shared several captionless photos of the party. beyonce.com I want to be there: beyonce.com
